name: Sleeping Mushrooms
description: Sleeping Mushrooms is a tabletop RPG for three or more players. The aim of the game is to fulfill the Mushroom Monarch's request of finding and delivering 15 rare mushrooms to the  government of Fungi Kingdom. The first traveler to complete this task wins, but there's a catch! Obstacles, rivalry, betrayal, comradery, are some of the things that will stand between you and the finish line. Good luck and have fun!
